# hitachi_vsp_supported_host_modes (Data Source)

VSP Supported Host Modes: The following request obtains information about supported host modes and host mode options.

## Example Usage

```terraform
#
# Hitachi VSP Supported Host Modes Data Retrieval
#
# This data source retrieves the supported host modes and host mode options
# from a Hitachi VSP storage system.
#

data "hitachi_vsp_supported_host_modes" "vsp_supported_host_modes" {
  serial = 12345
}

output "vsp_supported_host_modes" {
  value = data.hitachi_vsp_supported_host_modes.vsp_supported_host_modes
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `serial` (Number) Serial number of the storage system

### Read-Only

- `host_mode_options` (List of Object) The following attributes related to the host mode option are output. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--host_mode_options))
- `host_modes` (List of Object) The following attributes related to the host mode are output. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--host_modes))
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedatt--host_mode_options"></a>
### Nested Schema for `host_mode_options`

Read-Only:

- `host_mode_option_description` (String)
- `host_mode_option_id` (Number)
- `required_host_modes` (List of Number)
- `scope` (String)


<a id="nestedatt--host_modes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `host_modes`

Read-Only:

- `host_mode_display` (String)
- `host_mode_id` (Number)
- `host_mode_name` (String)
